Reviews.Title: Windows 8 SUCKS!!!
Reviews.Author: Ray Coker
Reviews.Content: The Dell laptop is top notch when it comes to fit and finish, battery life, and operation, but the Widows 8 SUCKS!!!!

Reviews.Title: Quality at a reasonable price.
Reviews.Author: Sparkey
Reviews.Content: Really like the keyboard that lights up when on the plane, and cabin lights or off. Has lots of functions, and great battery life.

Reviews.Title: Great durable latop!
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: This is a robust laptop running Windows 7 pro.  Installed another 4gb of ram to max it out to 8gb.  Computer runs fast and reliable with a more than enough horsepower to do day to day tasks without slowing down.  Well built for the long haul.

Reviews.Title: Dell Laptop E5530
Reviews.Author: Linnie
Reviews.Content: I am a 67 year that is not very good with the computer but had an old desktop that has become outdated.  I recently gave up internet dial up service and have since come up to the latest.....I love this Dell laptop Windows 8 but probably should have bought one with touch screen but this is quiet an update for me - so will be happy with it.  I did purchase it with the number keypad because I am use to using that feature.  I felt the price was very good for this unit. It has been a challenge for me to learn Windows 8 but am determined to proof to my grown kids I can do it!  They tried to discourage me from Windows 8 thinking I would never be able to use it.  So far so good!
